Header: Army Rugby Makes Historic Win against Kandy SC Supermen
Content: Sri Lanka Army Rugby players making a landmark achievement on Saturday (12) managed to go for a thin victory over ‘unbeatable Kandy SC’ at Nittawela grounds. The final score as the match ended stood at Army (23) - Kandy SC (22). This match was held under Dialog Inter Club Rugby Tournament - 2018/19. According to records, this defending champs suffer their defeat after losing to three years ago; they lost the last match in 2016. Army had a good plan for this match. Prabath Kumara, Nalaka Maduranga, Gayan Salinda and Isuru Medagedara collected scores with the support of all players.
